events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position submitted by the candidate and will begin the review process shortly.
The candidate's application has been categorized under the Engineering department as a Software Engineer role based on the resume keywords.
A recruiter specialized in Engineering roles has been assigned to manage the candidateâ€™s application and coordinate next steps.
Completed the initial screening call where the candidate demonstrated strong fundamental knowledge in software development.
Received a prompt and enthusiastic response from the candidate confirming their interest in moving forward with the technical interview.
Scheduled a technical interview for the candidate with the engineering team to assess coding skills and problem-solving ability next week.
